name: Jack Norris
title: Software Developer | Web Enthusiast | Lifelong Learner
about: Hello! I'm a passionate developer with a love for creating clean, efficient, and beautiful web applications. I specialize in the MERN stack and enjoy tackling challenging problems.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A sleek and intuitive task manager to help you stay organized. Built with Vite and Tailwind CSS.
